nodes.text: The Vallusk Cluster was a cluster of protostars near the Roil in the Gordian Reach sector of the Outer Rim Territories. It lacked habitable planets.
The Vallusk Cluster was a common location for starships to come out of hyperspace and recalibrate their navigation computers for the trip to Arkuda.
Admiral Ackbar created a distraction in the Vallusk Cluster, engaging four Star Destroyers, so the Rebels at Massassi Station could run the Imperial blockade of the Yavin system.
